name: RSS to Telegram Bot
description: A Telegram RSS bot that cares about your reading experience

TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Get it from @BotFather

MANAGER.description: Your Telegram user ID. Get it from @userinfobot

TELEGRAPH_TOKEN.description: Telegraph API access token. Get it from https://api.telegra.ph/createAccount?short_name=RSStT&author_name=Maintained%20by%20jp0id&author_url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.me%2Fjp0id

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API hash. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

IPV6_PRIOR.description: Enforce fetching feeds over IPv6 firstly or not? (0/1)
